lore: If critically injured, the largest and most ferocious Fenrisian Wolves are rebuilt, mechanically augmented by the Chapterâ€™s Iron Priests. These Cyberwolves may return to their old pack, to lead their kin and hunt with bionically enhanced muscles and steel fangs. Exhibiting such strength, flesh-and-blood wolves instinctively follow them.

otherAbilities.name: Close In for the Kill:
otherAbilities.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets an enemy unit that is Below Half-strength , add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll .

otherAbilities.name: Alpha Hunter:
otherAbilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Scouts 6" ability.
